meanings.definition: Wearing a smug, conceited, or silly smile.
meanings.sent1: She gave a smirky grin after winning the game.
meanings.sent2: He always has a smirky look on his face when he tells a joke.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked smirky after knocking over the vase.
meanings.sent4: Her smirky expression made it clear she knew more than she was letting on.
meanings.sent5: The villain's smirky smile sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.sent1: The comedian's smirky delivery of the punchline had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but find his smirky attitude endearing.
meanings.sent3: The smirky waiter winked as he handed us the menu.
meanings.sent4: His smirky behavior at the meeting hinted at his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The detective's smirky gaze hinted that he already knew the culprit.
